attributes.action: Bring back democracy! (New idea, I know!)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many good people died for our domacracy, why? If you don't want them to have died for nothing then sign to get our domacracy back. We are now treating the people of this country as we have treated the world in the past, as if they don't matter... Bring us back our democracy!
We should have ballots for all the major issues that affect us such as smoking, criminal sentanceing etc. Please sign for our right to have our say.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
